      <T> java.lang.String toSerializationFormat(ActorRef<T> ref)
      Generate full String representation including the uid for the actor cell instance as URI fragment, replacing the Address in the RootActor Path with the local one unless this path&rsquo;s address includes host and port information.

      • toSerializationFormat

        public <T> java.lang.String toSerializationFormat(ActorRef<T> ref)
        Generate full String representation including the uid for the actor cell instance as URI fragment, replacing the Address in the RootActor Path with the local one unless this path&rsquo;s address includes host and port information. This representation should be used as serialized representation.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        (undocumented)
